page.title: 16Lifestyles
page.content: The Newport area has a high standard of living. There are several hotels and cafes where snacks, bar lunches and evening meals are served. A new pub is presently being built in Wormit. One of the hotels holds discos at the weekends and other organisations hold discos for children and adults. People can play fruit machines and space invaders in the hotels. Newport has a carry out fish and chip shop whose speciality is frogs legs. There is a hairdresser which has an excellent reputation for fashionable hairstyles. People come from all over to have their hair done there. As for fashionable clothes most people buy them in Dundee as there are no fashion shops in Newport.
